public class PersonalDevelopmentBoard
extends it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
The place where a player puts Development Cards;

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonalDevelopmentBoard

      public PersonalDevelopmentBoard()
      Class constructor. Instantiates a new Personal Development Board. It creates three decks and sets the count of the cards to zero.

      Parameters:

      Parameters:
      developmentCard - the card to be added
      Throws:
      it.polimi.ingsw.utils.exceptions.PersonalBoardException - if the card can't be put because of the level.
